text: Monfragüe is a comarca (county, with no administrative role) of Extremadura, western Spain. It contains one of the country's fifteen National Parks, . Spanish Ministry of the Environment website . Since 1979, the area has been protected as a natural park. Monfragüe was one of 100 finalists for the 12 Treasures of Spain in 2007. ==References== == Other websites == *Magazine about Monfragüe Category:Province of Cáceres Category:National parks in Spain Category:2007 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Spain
title: Monfragüe
